name: Castle Defender AR
description:
Castle Defender AR is an endless shoot’em up game where you need to stop soldiers from invading your castle. Once you place the castle on the floor, soldiers will fly down from the sky using their parachutes and try to invade your castle.

You need to take them down as fast as possible, hopefully, while they are in mid-air. Ammo is very limited, so you need to make sure not to miss shots. Some soldiers will drop ammo on the floor, so make sure you tap on the left side to pick them out. Once you are out of ammo or the castle health reaches zero it’s game over.

Using your phone’s camera users must stop attacking soldiers from invading your castle created on a plane surface.

With an engaging user experience and a well designed in-game economy, Castle Defender AR is by far the most fun Augmented Reality game available on the app store.

Special Features:
- Purge the soldiers to ammunition.
- Pick the ammunition to refill your ammo.
- Stop the soldiers from entering the castle.
- Score big time as you protect your castle.
- Endless gameplay to keep you engaged while you are "waiting for ...!?"

Have fun defending your castle from the soldiers.
